customer_inquiry: Hi, I recently bought the Maireana linen sheets in Sage. I'm just wondering, how should I wash these to keep them soft? I don't want to ruin the texture.
brand_response:
Hi there,

Thanks so much for choosing BlueBush! It‚Äôs lovely to hear you‚Äôve picked up the Maireana linen in Sage‚Äîthat‚Äôs one of our favourite colours this season.

To keep them beautifully soft, we recommend a gentle machine wash on a cool cycle (30¬∞C is perfect). Use a mild, eco-friendly detergent and avoid bleach, as it can weaken the natural flax fibres. If you can, line drying in the shade is best for longevity and the environment, but a cool tumble dry works too.

They actually get softer with every wash, so enjoy the process!

Warmly,
The BlueBush Team

customer_inquiry: Are your shipping satchels actually compostable? Or is it just greenwashing? ü§î
brand_response: Great question! We appreciate you holding us accountable 👏. Yes, our satchels are 100% home compostable (certified AS 5810). You can pop them straight in your worm farm or compost bin, and they will break down within months. No plastic nasties here! 🌿

customer_inquiry: Do you have a store in Perth?

BlueBush Trade Team

customer_inquiry: I'm calling because my delivery is late. It was supposed to be here Tuesday.

Customer: Yeah, I needed it for the weekend.

customer_inquiry: Submission: Newsletter Subscription. Email: user@example.com
brand_response: Welcome to the family! 🌿 You are now on the list for our 'Slow Living' newsletter. Keep an eye on your inbox for eco-tips, new arrival alerts, and a little welcome treat.

customer_inquiry: Hello, are your candles made with paraffin? I get headaches from strong synthetic scents.
brand_response:
Hi,

Thanks for asking‚Äîthis is such an important question for a healthy home.

Rest assured, we never use paraffin or petroleum-based waxes. All BlueBush candles are hand-poured in WA using 100% natural soy wax and pure essential oils. They provide a gentle, natural scent that is much kinder to your senses (and the air quality!).

If you are sensitive, I'd recommend our 'Paperbark' scent‚Äîit's very subtle and earthy.

Warm regards,
The BlueBush Team

customer_inquiry: Can I return sale items if they don't fit? üëó
brand_response: Hey! For 'Final Sale' items, we generally don't offer returns unless they are faulty. However, if it's just a regular sale promotion, our standard 30-day return policy applies! Check the product page for the specific badge to be sure 👍.

customer_inquiry: Are your products vegan?
brand_response: Most of our range is vegan! We use materials like bamboo, linen, and organic cotton. The only exceptions are our recycled wool blankets and beeswax wraps. Each product page lists the materials clearly.

customer_inquiry: I can't figure out how to put this flat-pack shelving together. The instructions are confusing.

Customer: You're not wrong. Step 3 makes no sense.

Agent: Ah, Step 3 on the 'Jarrah' unit? That one is a bit tricky. The trick is to line up the dowels *before* you tighten the cam-locks. Are you looking at the diagram with the long screws right now?

customer_inquiry: Submission: Out of Stock Notification for 'Banksia Ceramic Vase'.
brand_response: Good taste! The Banksia Vase is a favourite. We've logged your request and will send you an email the moment our potter delivers the next batch. Expect an update in roughly 2 weeks.

customer_inquiry: Do you ship to New Zealand? ü•ù

customer_inquiry: Submission: Contact Us. Message: I am an artisan weaver based in Tasmania. How can I stock my products with you?
brand_response: Thanks for getting in touch! We love discovering local makers. We've passed your details to our Buying Team. If your weaving style aligns with our upcoming collections, they will reach out to request a sample.

customer_inquiry: Hi, do you offer a warranty on your bamboo furniture?
brand_response:
Hi there,

Thanks for your enquiry! We stand by the quality of our craftsmanship.

Yes, all our BlueBush bamboo furniture pieces come with a 2-year structural warranty. This covers any manufacturing defects or material faults. Since bamboo is a natural material, slight variations in grain are normal, but if anything splits or breaks under normal use, we've got you covered.

Let me know if you need the full T&Cs!

Cheers,
The BlueBush Team

customer_inquiry: What's the thread count on the sheets?
brand_response: Hey! For our Organic Cotton percale, it's a crisp 300 thread count. For our Linen range, we measure by weight (GSM) rather than thread count‚Äîours is a lush 170GSM, which is the sweet spot for durability and softness! 😌

customer_inquiry: payment options
brand_response: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Afterpay. We also accept Apple Pay for quick checkout on mobile.

customer_inquiry: I'm looking at the 'BlueBush' rug, but I'm worried it might be too scratchy for my toddler.
brand_response:
Agent: Hi! Thanks for getting in touch. That's a great question‚Äîlittle ones spend a lot of time on the floor, don't they?

Customer: Exactly, she's crawling everywhere.

Agent: In that case, I'd probably steer you towards our Organic Cotton or the Recycled Wool blend rather than the Jute. The Jute is durable but can be a bit coarse for little knees. The Cotton one is super soft and machine washable, which is a bonus with kids!

customer_inquiry: Submission: Review for 'Hemp Table Runner'. Rating: 5 Stars.
brand_response: Thank you for the glowing review! We are thrilled to hear the Hemp Table Runner has added a natural touch to your dining space. Your feedback helps other eco-conscious shoppers make the right choice.

customer_inquiry: Is the packaging plastic free? I hate getting styrofoam.
brand_response: We are with you on that! 😥 We are proud to be 100% plastic-free. We use honeycomb paper, cardboard, and cornstarch peanuts (which dissolve in water!). Your bin will be empty, and your worm farm will be full. 🌿

customer_inquiry: speak to human
brand_response: I can connect you to one of our team members in Perth. Our live chat hours are 9am - 5pm AWST. Would you like to connect now?

customer_inquiry: Hi, I'm calling about the ceramic dinner set. Is it dishwasher safe?
brand_response:
Agent: G'day! Thanks for calling. You're asking about the 'Saltbush' ceramic range?

Customer: Yes, the speckled white one.

Agent: Beautiful choice. Yes, they are absolutely dishwasher safe. They're fired at a very high temperature so they're quite robust. We just recommend avoiding lemon-heavy detergents if you can, as it keeps the glaze shinier for longer.

customer_inquiry: Submission: Product Question. Will the 'Eucalypt' Throw match a grey sofa?
brand_response: Thanks for your question. The 'Eucalypt' Throw has a warm, green-grey undertone. It pairs beautifully with charcoal or light grey sofas, adding a subtle touch of colour without clashing. We hope this helps you visualise it in your lounge!

customer_inquiry: I'm interested in the beeswax wraps, but I'm allergic to pine resin. Do yours contain resin?
brand_response:
Hi there,

Thank you for checking before you buy‚Äîsafety first!

Yes, our standard beeswax wraps do contain a small amount of pine resin to give them that sticky 'cling'. However, we do stock a 'Sensitive' range which is resin-free and uses just beeswax and jojoba oil. They aren't quite as sticky, but they work perfectly for wrapping sandwiches or cheese.

Would you like me to send you a link to that specific collection?

Warmly,
BlueBush Support

customer_inquiry: Hi, what are the dimensions of the 'Bower' laundry hamper?

Thanks for the query! The 'Bower' hamper is designed to fit a standard family load.

It stands 60cm tall, with a diameter of 40cm. It holds approximately 60 litres of laundry. It's also collapsible, so you can tuck it away if you need the floor space.

Hope that helps you measure up your space!

Best,
BlueBush Support

brand_response: Yes, we do! You can select Afterpay at checkout to split your payment into 4 interest-free instalments. It's available for all orders over $50.

customer_inquiry: Submission: Question about 'Stone Diffuser'. Does it turn off automatically when the water runs out?
brand_response: Hi there! Great question. Yes, for safety and peace of mind, the Stone Diffuser has an auto shut-off sensor. Once the water level gets too low, it powers down instantly to protect the ceramic element.

customer_inquiry: Hi BlueBush, is your sunscreen greasy? I hate the feeling of thick zinc.
brand_response:
Hi,

We totally get that‚Äînobody wants to feel sticky at the beach!

Our 'Kakadu Plum Zinc' is formulated to be 'Clear Zinc'. It goes on white so you can see where you've missed, but rubs in completely clear within seconds. It uses a natural coconut oil base, so it feels more like a moisturiser than a heavy paste.

Hope that helps you stay sun-safe!

Cheers,
The BlueBush Team

customer_inquiry: Does the bug spray actually work on sandflies? ü¶ü
brand_response: It sure does! 🥰 Our 'Mozzie Mist' uses Lemon Eucalyptus oil, which is scientifically proven to deter sandflies and mozzies just as effectively as DEET, but without the harsh chemical smell. Perfect for camping!
